item.description:
Welcome to everyone intrigued by Hypnosis & Neuro-Linguistic Programming (NLP). Here are the details of the November meeting of the Greater Boston Hypnosis and NLP group. [b]This month’s topic:

Topic: All That is Hypnosis

Let's get back to some Basics  -opening with discussions about what people think hypnosis is and what opinions other hypnotists may have run into.

We will have some demos on hypnotic phenomena and a general hypnosis session for clarity of thought.

If you are an experienced or trained hypnotist, you are invited to participate and or give demos.  If you are new or just want to experience hypnosis, you can sit back, enjoy, and learn.

"There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle."

- Albert Einstein

 

Kevin Martin, CHT

Hypnotist Positive Effects Methuen, MA (978) 494-4542 kenda_assoc@msn.com www.poseffects.com

---------------------------------- Helping people to help themselves

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater Boston Hypnosis and NLP Meetup - Lexington-All that is Hypnosis
